Notice Contact Us Mission, Vision and Values Mission Our integrated team delivers compassionate, inclusive, comprehensive medical and behavioral health services that support student wellbeing, promote resilience, and limit interruptions in academic pursuits with a student-centered focus consistent with the mission of SIUE. Vision We aspire to foster a campus hub that supports the mind and body – an environment where students are equipped to excel and lead fulfilling lives. Values Student-Centered - We recognize every student is unique and strive to provide tailored support that addresses individual health concerns, backgrounds, and preferences. Quality - We are dedicated to providing high-quality healthcare services that meet the highest standards of care. Our commitment to excellence ensures that students receive the best possible support for their physical and mental well-being. Equity - We strive to create a fair and inclusive healthcare environment where all students have equal access to high-quality services, regardless of their background, identity, or circumstances. Community Engagement - We believe that strong partnerships with students, faculty, and local organizations enhance our ability to promote health and well-being. We actively seek collaborative opportunities to address the needs of our campus community. Â
